segments.text: Look ! I bought these shoes only three weeks ago and there is a hole in them already .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If that happen to me , I ’ ll take them back to the shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I did . But they said they won ’ t change them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s terrible . But if they wouldn ’ t change them , I know what I would do .
segments.speaker: S2
